original_title: National Theatre Live: Dick Whittington – A Pantomime for 2020
overview: First staged at Lyric Hammersmith in 2018 and freshly updated for 2020, Ned Bennett directs this wild and inventive production and explores what it is like to come from a small town and arrive in a big city today. With a host of colourful characters, irreverent jokes, talking animals and popular songs this is Dick Whittington as never seen before.
title: National Theatre Live: Dick Whittington – A Pantomime for 2020
